mapper.insert: insert into resource (id, create_at, remarks, update_at, icon, list_order, `name`, perm, pid, res_type, tip, url) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{create_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{update_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list_order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{res_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update resource set create_at = #{create_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = #{update_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, list_order = #{list_order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perm = #{perm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, res_type = #{res_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tip = #{tip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_at, remarks, update_at, icon, list_order, `name`, perm, pid, res_type, tip, url from resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_at, remarks, update_at, icon, list_order, `name`, perm, pid, res_type, tip, url from resource
